roleset.name: put rouge on, cause to redden
roleset.note: ROUGE-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: tease (41.2.2), feather (9.9), hand-corrected by Claire. Member of VNcls braid-41.2.2, butter-9.9. (from rouge.01-v)

roles.note: Use ARGM-PRD for resulting state, e.g. "She rouged her cheeks a dark ruby red" (from rouge.01-v)

example.name: All arguments
example.text: She rouged her cheeks with berry stain when she knew her fianc? was coming.
example.arg: when she knew her fianc? was coming

example.name: No rouge mentioned
example.text: Flappers, *PRO* rouge your knees and do the Charleston!
